overview: This is a client-side configuration file. It's nice if we can do
client-side development without a server. Our goal is that the system
should approximately work grabbing dummy files served as static files
without a server, and grabbing real data with a server. This file define
paths. If served as a static directory, it will grab this file. If served
dynamically, the server will rewrite to a file pointing to web sockets, etc.
